definition.name: Switch
definition.purpose: Allow users to toggle a boolean value on or off
definition.description: A stylized, accessible switch component built on top of Radix UI's SwitchPrimitive. It supports all props of SwitchPrimitive.Root and can be customized with a className. The switch visually indicates checked and unchecked states and is keyboard accessible.

properties.description: All props from React.ComponentProps<typeof SwitchPrimitive.Root> are supported.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the switch root element

initial.data: Unchecked state by default unless otherwise specified by the 'checked' prop.

visible: A horizontal pill-shaped switch with a thumb on the left (unchecked) or right (checked).
enabled: Clicking or tapping the switch toggles its state
Keyboard navigation and toggling via space/enter

when.description: User clicks or taps the switch, or toggles it via keyboard

visible: Switch in current state (checked or unchecked)

to.state: Checked if previously unchecked, unchecked if previously checked

effects: onChange handler is called if provided
Visual state updates to reflect checked/unchecked

definition.visualLayout: A horizontally oriented pill-shaped track with a circular thumb that slides left/right to indicate off/on. The component uses theme colors for checked/unchecked states and supports dark mode.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's SwitchPrimitive.Root and Thumb. Accepts all props from SwitchPrimitive.Root. Uses a utility function 'cn' for className merging. Designed for accessibility and keyboard navigation.
